name: tm63
effect: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
